WHERE STATUS='N'

FROM TB_HOMETRAINING ORDER BY HT_ENROLL_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

, VIDEO_LINK ) VALUES ( SEQ_HTPNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ?
, SYSDATE , ? )
